summary: Andy Marlow, an ex British S.A.S serviceman turned mercenary, is sent into the Balkans after a military coup has arisen to rescue a U.S ambassador and his aide.
cast: Robert Fucilla|Kirsty Mitchell|Robert James-Collier|Danny Sapani|Antony Byrne|Geoff Bell|Nicholas Sidi|Michael Nardone|Vas Blackwood|Robert Boulter|Billy Zane|Ian Burfield|Stewart Scudamore|Dre' Michael Chaney|Andrew Harwood Mills|John Adams|Dixie Arnold|Lee Asquith-Coe|Charlotte Beckett|Adam Levy|Ivana Fucilla|Brad Moore|Gareth Bennett-Ryan|Jonathan Bonnici|Chris Brazier|Philip Bristow|Martin Butler|Therese Chavez|Charles Claydon|Chris Collins|Lee Craven|Craig Davis|Daniel Dresner|Michael Enever|Jonathan Fisk|Daniel Gentely|Paul Holloway|Christopher Hughes|Sophie Karl|Helen Keech|Roman Beguns|Callum Locker|Duncan MacInnes|Stuart Mackie Ellis|Fiona Maclaine|Steven Benn|Annameka Andrade|William Fucilla|Raheel Riaz|Lawrence Robinson|Danny Darren|Gyuri Sarossy|Oscar Sette|Victoria Ley|Mick Slaney|Ope Michael Solaja|Corin Stuart|Damien Gerard|Simon Thorp|Andrew Turner|Dean Williams|Bob Woolf|Andrei Zayats|Claire Fletcher|Matthew Fox|Alex Hatton|Craig Izzard|Paul Jonah|Martin King|Johnny Pearmain|Vojislav Scelovic|Karem Shekh|David Smith|Dean R Williams|Alden Wright|Suzy Deakin|Bradley Potter|Sokol Ajazi|James a FitzGerald|Antti Hakala|Alain Stash|Katie Thomas|Cole Anderson-James|Rajiv Kumar
title: Mercenaries
